description:
As the curtain falls on the World Duel Carnival, peace has finally returned to Heartland City. But now, emissaries from the Barian World, hostile to the Astral World, are aiming to steal the "Numbers" and http://anidb.net/ch28991 [Astral] for themselves. In order to protect him, http://anidb.net/ch28990 [Yuuma], http://anidb.net/ch77759 [Kaito] and http://anidb.net/ch28992 [Shark] join together to combat the Barian menace, as they ultimately become involved in the Interdimensional War of two worlds.
Source: Yu-Gi-Oh! Wiki
Note: The http://anidb.net/a8140 [first Yuu Gi Ou! Zexal] series has been running at 7:30 p.m. on Mondays on TV Tokyo and five other stations. Yuu Gi Ou! Zexal II run in the 5:30 p.m. timeslot on Sundays (http://anidb.net/a9348 [Aikatsu!] idol card anime took over Yuu Gi Ou! Zexal`s old Monday timeslot, starting on October 8, 2012).

REGULAR.description:
The Barian invasion begins!  Yuma faces a dangerous new enemy who will go to any extreme to gain possession of Yuma’s Numbers in order to destroy Astral and his home!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Barian Shuurai! Kyougaku no Chaos Xyz Change!!
バリアン襲来! 驚愕のカオス·エクシーズ·チェンジ!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma’s battle with a dangerous and powerful soldier of Barian World continues as he strives to keep Astral safe!  Can Yuma beat this Barian enemy and his new Chaos Monster, or will Yuma end up losing what is most valuable to him… Astral?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shouri no Houteishiki yo Soroe Uchikudake Chaos Xyz!
勝利の方程式よ揃え 打ち砕けカオスエクシーズ!

REGULAR.description:
When pro duelist Devon Knox teaches a special class, Yuma gets taken to the school of hard knocks and learns a valuable lesson about the Barians he won’t soon forget!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yokare to Omotte Tadaima Sanjou! Shingetsu Rei to Moushimasu
よかれと思ってただいま参上! 真月零と申します

REGULAR.description:
Ray nominates Yuma to run against Caswell for the position of Class Representative, but when the Ray Way takes a turn for the worse, Yuma finds himself facing off against a Student Council President who’s been corrupted by the Barians!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel no Midare wa Kousoku Ihan!? Shutsugeki!? Tokumei Fuuki Commander
デュエルの乱れは校則違反!? 出撃!? 特命風紀コマンダー

REGULAR.description:
Shark gets hooked into a battle with the Barians when the President of the Comic Book Appreciation Club challenges him to a duel!  Can Shark outdraw the competition, or will his Number and life points be erased?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shark Gekikou!! Torawareta Imouto o Sukue!
シャーク激昂!! 捕らわれた妹を救え!

REGULAR.description:
Shark’s sister Rio makes a big splash on her first day at school, but not all the attention she gets is good, especially when she catches the eye of a Barian botanist!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hyouketsu Ranbu!! Koori no Joou: Kamishiro Rio
氷結乱舞!! 氷の女王 神代璃緒

REGULAR.description:
A new Barian threat arrives on the scene looking to take Yuma’s Numbers, but his plan gets tripped up when he falls head over heels for Tori!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Moukou Taiman Battle!! Yuuma vs. Fukutsu no Toushi Alito
猛攻タイマンバトル!! 遊馬VS不屈の闘士アリト

REGULAR.description:
When Yuma’s buddies can’t stop bickering, it’s time for them to face-off in the Friendship Games, a sports dueling competition with surprises around every corner… including Barians!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kotori ga Chaos Xyz Change!? Haran no Sports Duel Taikai
小鳥がカオスエクシーズ・チェンジ!? 波乱のスポーツデュエル大会

REGULAR.description:
A dangerous new Barian enemy arrives, and he’s bringing one of his world’s most powerful weapons to take down Yuma and Astral!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koukou no Barian Knight: Galaxy-Eyes-tsukai Misael Arawaru
孤高のバリアン騎士(ナイト) 銀河眼(ギャラクシーアイズ)使いミザエル現る

REGULAR.description:
Mizar batters Yuma to his breaking point… until a surprise duelist steps in to take down Mizar and go claw-to-claw with his Galaxy-Eyes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choudokyuu Jigen Ryuu!! Galaxy-Eyes Tachyon Dragon
超弩級次元竜!!銀河眼の時空竜(ギャラクシーアイズ・タキオン・ドラゴン)

REGULAR.description:
In order to set Yuma straight, Shark steals Yuma’s Key!  Can Yuma find the courage to face Shark, or will Yuma’s fears leave him cowering for cover?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yomigaere!! Yuuma vs. Shark Fukkatsu no Duel
蘇れ!!遊馬VSシャーク復活の決闘(デュエル)

REGULAR.description:
Let’s get ready to duuuuuuuuel!  Yuma steps into the ring with Alito, but can he dodge this Barian’s Battlin’ Boxers before they send him to the canvas for a ten count?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shippuujinrai no Counter Battle! Ketsui no Toushi Alito
疾風迅雷のカウンターバトル!決意の闘士アリト

REGULAR.description:
It’s Round 2 of the heavyweight battle between Yuma and Alito!  Can Yuma bob and weave his way around Alito’s attacks, or will this Barian’s fancy footwork finish him off for good?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Unare! Chaos Numbers: Yuuma ni Muketa Final Blow
唸れ! カオス・ナンバーズ 遊馬に向けたファイナルブロー

REGULAR.description:
Girag’s got revenge on his mind and Ray in his sights, but when Yuma steps in to save the day, the Ray Way steers Yuma off course!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gilag Moushuu! Sakuretsu, Hikou Shibaku Muhou
ギラグ猛襲! 炸裂, 秘孔死爆無惚[ひこうしばくむほう]

REGULAR.description:
Girag has Yuma and Ray in the palm of his hand, but will a secret that Ray has been keeping help our heroes escape the clutches of this Barian behemoth?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: V no Koudou: Choushinsei Hope Ray V!!
V[ブイ]の鼓動 超新生ホープレイV[ブイ]!!

REGULAR.description:
Astral and Yuma face a challenge so daunting that they must turn to their biggest adversary for help!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoutou Dark Astral: Kage no Kyojin e no Chousen!!
共闘ダークアストラル 影の巨人への挑戦!!

REGULAR.description:
When Orbital 7 crashes into Lillybot, it’s love at first sensor!  So when he discovers his beloved bot is in trouble, he motors to free her from her tormentor… Yuma!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Obomi Dakkan Sakusen!? Koi Suru Oira wa Muteki de Arimasu
You Give Love a Bot Name
オボミ奪還作戦!? 恋スルオイラハ無敵デアリマス

REGULAR.description:
Shark’s trying to control Rio’s life and she’s not taking it anymore!  Will this family feud turn into a feeding frenzy for Shark, or will Rio put her brother’s winning streak on ice?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shark vs. Rio: 100-senme no Kenka Duel!!
シャークvs璃緒 100戦目の喧嘩デュエル!!

REGULAR.description:
The gang’s dressed up as their favorite monsters for the school’s fun fair, but when Anna crashes the festivities, the party ends for Yuma!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein nicht ganz perfektes Paar - Teil 1
Gekisen Couple Duel: "Anna Yatsu" to Ore ga Tag!?
激戦カップルデュエル ｢アンナ奴｣と俺がタッグ!?

REGULAR.description:
Being Anna’s boyfriend is a dangerous job, but when Anna’s teacher plays a Barian card, Yuma finds out just how dangerous it is!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein nicht ganz perfektes Paar - Teil 2
Kenshinteki na Ai: Yuuma ni Takushita Last Draw!!
献身的な愛 遊馬に託したラストドロー!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma is confronted by an enemy from the past who casts a dark shadow on his future!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shingetsu no Kiki! An`yakusha Vector no Shuugeki
真月の危機! 暗躍者ベクターの襲撃

REGULAR.description:
Yuma embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue Ray from the evil clutches of Vector!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iza Kessen no Chi e! Ou no Kagi no Hikousen, Hasshin!!
いざ決戦の地へ! 皇の鍵の飛行船, 発進!!

REGULAR.description:
The Barians are on the attack, and Yuma is ready to risk everything to rescue Ray!  But when Vector reveals a terrifying truth, Yuma`s dream of saving Ray turns into a nightmare!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyouki no Vector: Makyou Sargasso no Tatakai!
凶気のベクター 魔境サルガッソの闘い!

REGULAR.description:
Still reeling from Vector’s revelation that he and Ray Shadows are one and the same, Yuma looks to make Vector pay for all his lies!  But with Astral learning of Yuma’s own deceptions, will Yuma have to face Vector alone?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haiboku e no Countdown! Deck Hakai no Kyoufu
敗北へのカウントダウン! デッキ破壊の恐怖

REGULAR.description:
All the cards are on the table!  Can our heroes defeat the dark and dangerous Barians, or will they end up one card short?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genkai Toppa!! "Kibou Ou Hope Ray Victory"
限界突破!! 「希望皇ホープレイ・ヴィクトリー」

REGULAR.description:
An ancient Barian deity awakens to add a terrifying new twist to Barian World’s agenda against Astral!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikousen Saikidou! Densetsu no Numbers o Mezase!!
飛行船再起動! 伝説のNo.[ナンバーズ]を目指せ!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma is put to the ultimate test when a Number Guardian traps his friends and forces him to battle for their freedom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inishie e no Tsuioku: Durbe to Hakuba Densetsu no Gen`ei
古への追憶 ドルベと白馬伝説の幻影

REGULAR.description:
Yuma searches for the second Mythyrian Number and ends up finding an old nemesis who is out for revenge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 狡猾なるベクター アストラルvsNo.[ナンバーズ]96

REGULAR.description:
Every time Astral attacks, he puts Yuma’s life in danger, but if he doesn’t attack, he’s a goner himself!  It’s a no-win situation in the cruelest duel yet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chaos no Ryouiki: Numbers 96 Kyouki no Keshin!!
混沌[カオス]の領域 No.[ナンバーズ]96凶気の化身!!

REGULAR.description:
Alito’s back in the ring to take down Yuma, but a fair fight isn’t in the cards when Alito has one of Yuma’s friends in his corner!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chinmoku no Toushi Alito: Atsuki Duelist-tachi no Saikai!
沈黙の闘士アリト 熱き決闘者[デュエリスト]たちの再会!

REGULAR.description:
Nistro’s under Alito’s control, and it’s up to Yuma and Dextra to free him!  Can this tag team duo bob and weave their way past Alito’s attacks, or will this Barian knock out any chances they have of winning?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: よみがえれ! 命を超えし決闘者(デュエリスト)魂!!

REGULAR.description:
The hunt for the Mythyrian Numbers leads our heroes to the peak of a perilous mountain where Kite’s skills are put to the test by a dragon-wielding Number Guardian!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Galaxy-Eyes-tsukai e no Shiren! Kaito Kesshi no Duel
銀河眼(ギャラクシーアイズ)使いへの試練! カイト決死のデュエル

REGULAR.description:
Kite faces his toughest challenge ever when a powerful Number Guardian threatens to take possession of his Galaxy-Eyes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mizael Densetsu! Numbers to Natta Kami no Ryuu
ミザエル伝説! No.(ナンバーズ)となった神の龍

REGULAR.description:
After an ancient statue is unearthed, Yuma finds himself between a rock and a furry place when he discovers that there’s more to Girag than meets the eye – like a red nose and whiskers!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakasareta Yuuma!? Girag Tanuki no Kawazan`you
化かされた遊馬!? ギラグ狸の皮算用

REGULAR.description:
It’s rough waters ahead for Yuma and his friends when the search for the last two Mythyrian Numbers leads them to an ancient ruin that lies beneath the bottom of the ocean!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaitei kara no Sasoi! Shark Mugen no Kioku
海底からの誘い! シャーク夢幻の記憶

REGULAR.description:
The battle beneath the ocean reaches new depths of danger when Shark comes face to face with the Number Guardian, Abyss!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shark vs Gekiroushin Abyss! Gekitotsu, 2-tai no Numbers!!
シャークvs激瀧神アビス! 激突, 2体のNo.[ナンバーズ]!!

REGULAR.description:
Earth and Astral World are under attack!  Yuma and Astral are the only ones who can stop it, but saving their planets may come at the ultimate price…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Horobiyuku 3-tsu no Sekai! Kyuukyoku Bousou Numbers 96!!
滅びゆく3つの世界! 究極暴走No.[ナンバーズ]96!!

REGULAR.description:
The battle between our two heroes and Number 96 comes to a shocking conclusion that leaves only one person standing!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shuuen no Toki...! Tomo ni Takushita Kizuna
終焉のとき...! 相棒[とも]に託した絆

REGULAR.description:
Someone’s stealing memories, and the Super Secret Numbers Club are going to find out who!  But when the hunters become the hunted, Yuma’s friends quickly realize that they need help from an exterminator!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 純真なる決闘者[デュエリスト]! ｢先史遺産[オーパーツ]｣始動!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma and Trey team up to take down a bugged out Barian who likes to munch on memories!  Can Yuma and Trey swat down this winged menace before he swoops in to drain their brains?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atarashiki Kibou no Chikara!! Yuujou Gattai "Atlantal Hope"
新しき希望の力!! 友情合体｢アトランタルホープ｣

REGULAR.description:
With Vector’s patience for failure fading fast, Mr. Heartland begs for a final chance to beat Yuma!  Desperate to deliver, Heartland deploys his most dangerous duelist to date, a treacherous Barian armed with toxic tentacles!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 悲哀なる決闘者[デュエリスト] ｢地獄人形[ギミックパペット]｣冥動!!

REGULAR.description:
Shark and Quattro struggle to keep their heads above water as they battle the Barian duelist from the deep, Chironex!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shark to IV: Tenka Souran!! Jigoku Zame Tag
シャークとIV 天下騒乱!! 地獄ザメタッグ

REGULAR.description:
Yuma’s all set to travel across the stars to save Astral, but an unexpected pest pops by to plunder Yuma’s plans!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 冷厳なる決闘者[デュエリスト] ｢天蓋星[ダイソンスフィア]｣激動!!

REGULAR.description:
Kite and Quinton team up to swat down the bug-eyed Barian Scritch!  But when Kite starts hallucinating, Quinton must fend off their flying foe while simultaneously steering clear of his confused partner’s attacks!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyakujou no Kaito: Kyuukyoku no Shitei Kessen!!
逆上のカイト 究極の師弟血戦!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma’s mission to find Astral turns into a high-stakes race against time when Yuma learns the Guardian of Astral World plans to erase his best friend from existence!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aoki Seichi no Kami: Senkou no Eliphas
青き聖地の神 閃光のエリファス

REGULAR.description:
Yuma faces his toughest challenge yet when he battles against an opponent who can draw the exact card he needs every turn!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koujigen no Kyouchi! Kyoui no Double Rank-Up!!
高次元の境地! 脅威のダブル・ランクアップ!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma fights to free his best friend Astral in a duel he cannot win but must not lose!  Meanwhile, Shark comes face-to-face with his past and learns the truth about his Barian background!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ni Daiou Gekitotsu! Inishie no Duel Shark vs. Vector
二大王激突! 古の決闘[デュエル]シャークVSベクター

REGULAR.description:
With Astral’s fate hanging in the balance, the heart-pounding battle between Yuma and Astral World’s Guardian thunders to its frenzied finish!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikari o Tsugu Mono!! Kibou Ou Hope Roots
光を継ぐ者!! 希望皇ホープルーツ

REGULAR.description:
To get a lead on Yuma and his buddies, Vector bombards Earth with bogus Numbers.  When one of them takes the bait, it puts Mr. Heartland and his sinister swarm of insect monsters hot on the gang’s heels!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sekai Kanraku no Zenchou!! Mr. Heartland no Daihanran
世界陥落の前兆!! Mr.ハートランドの大反乱

REGULAR.description:
With Kite grounded, Yuma and Astral step up to take the buzzing Barian, Mr. Heartland down!   Can our heroes repel this pest, or will they end up getting squashed instead?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuusha no Gaisen! Tomo no Ishi o Hikitsuge!!
勇者の凱旋! 友の意志を引き継げ!!

REGULAR.description:
When all seven Barian Emperors ambush Yuma, some friendly faces drop in to help take the Barians out!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ｢バリアン七皇[ななこう]｣ 紅き世界の戦士!!

REGULAR.description:
Quattro faces off against the Barian leader, Nash!  Hoping to find Shark swimming just beneath his new Barian identity, Quattro looks to hook his old friend and reel him back in!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fujimi no Soujutsushi: Silent Honors Dark Knight
不死身の槍術士 S・H・Dark Knight[サイレント・オナーズ・ダーク・ナイト]

REGULAR.description:
The back and forth battle between Nash and Quattro comes to a climactic conclusion!  Will this battle lure the real Shark out from inside his Barian form, or will it cost Quattro much more than he ever could have imagined?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saraba Tomo yo... Kokuu e Chiru Omoi!!
さらば友よ... 虚空へ散る想い!!

REGULAR.description:
Looking to get revenge for their brother Quattro, Trey and Quinton team up to take down the treacherous Barian, Mizar!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukutsu no Kyoudai Combo: Tachyon Dragon Yuuhei!!
不屈の兄弟コンボ 時空竜[タキオン・ドラゴン]幽閉!!

REGULAR.description:
As Quinton and Trey`s devastating double duel against Mizar flares to a feverish finish, the brothers reveal the real reason they are battling the Barian!  Their startling secret hits Mizar harder than any attack!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wakare no Namida... Neo Galaxy-Eyes Tachyon Dragon no Boui!!
別れの涙... 超銀河眼の時空龍[ネオ・ギャラクシーアイズ・タキオン・ドラゴン]の暴威!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma and Astral`s race to face Don Thousand is stopped cold by the hot-blooded Alito, now brainwashed by the Barian deity!  Can they think fast enough to free Alito of Don Thousand, or will he take the two down for the count?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chaos no Kage: Yuuma vs. Shuunen no Toushi Alito
Vier Fäuste für einen Alito - Teil 1
混沌[カオス]の影 遊馬vs執念の闘士アリト

REGULAR.description:
Yuma and Astral duel desperately to try and turn an old enemy into their newest ally, but with Don Thousand in Alito’s corner, Yuma and Astral find themselves up against the ropes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakusei no Nekken!! Alito Fukkatsu no Toki
Vier Fäuste für einen Alito - Teil 2
覚醒の熱拳[ねっけん]!! アリト復活の刻[とき]

REGULAR.description:
Vector sets his sights on squashing Marin and Dumon, and there’s nothing Shark can do but watch his sister and best friend squirm before his eyes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ベクターの嘲笑 引き裂かれた七皇!!

REGULAR.description:
The thunderous battle between Marin, Dumon and Vector shatters expectations as it nears its startling end!  Meanwhile, Alito stands tall against his former friend, the Barian behemoth - Girag!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wagami o Tate ni! Durbe Saigo no Chikai!!
我が身を盾に! ドルベ最後の誓い!!

REGULAR.description:
Marin`s duel with Vector charges to its climactic conclusion!  Can Marin outduel this venomous villain, or will Vector remain invincible?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wakare wa Setsuna... Kanashiki Kyoudai no Shukumei
別れは刹那... 哀しき兄妹の宿命

REGULAR.description:
The long foreshadowed faceoff is finally here!  Kite and Mizar go toe-to-toe to settle who is the one true Galaxy-Eyes master!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yomigaeru Ryuuou Shinwa!! "Galaxy-Eyes Prime Photon Dragon"
甦る竜皇神話(りゅうおうしんわ)!! 『銀河眼の光子竜皇(ギャラクシーアイズ・プライム・フォトン・ドラゴン)』

REGULAR.description:
The fierce face-off between Kite and Mizar soars to new heights as their battle to determine the one true Galaxy-Eyes master roars to a finish!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mirai o Kono Te ni! Ginga Kessen Shuuketsu!!
未来をこの手に! 銀河決戦終結!!

REGULAR.description:
Nash races to face Vector, but with Vector`s enhanced strength, he may be speeding towards his own demise!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyouki no Kioku! Nasch vs. Majin Vector!!
凶気の記憶! ナッシュVS魔神(まじん)ベクター!!

REGULAR.description:
While Nash and Vector`s danger-fueled duel hits dizzying new heights of havoc, the truth behind Vector’s dark past is revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Vector no Honrou! Torawareta Nakama no Kizuna!!
ベクターの翻弄! 捕われた仲間の絆!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma teams up with an unlikely ally to take down the great Barian deity, Don Thousand!  Can this twosome draw out a victory, or will Don Thousand douse any hope these heroes have of being victorious?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 混沌[カオス]たる存在[もの] 『ドン・サウザンド』光来!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma and Shark’s battle with Don Thousand takes a treacherous turn when the great Barian deity reveals he can rewrite their cards into entirely different cards!  Can Yuma and Shark defeat a foe who can change their every move?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 切り拓け未来 アストラルの決断!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma and Shark turn the tides and put Don Thousand on the brink of defeat, but DonThousand still has a thousand tricks up his sleeve!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Omoi wa Hitotsu ni! Souzouryuu "Numeron Dragon"
想いはひとつに! 創造龍『ヌメロン・ドラゴン』

REGULAR.description:
Once friends, now foes - Yuma and Shark face off in a battle where winning could mean losing everything!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Konton Shuuen: Hissatsu no Final Hope Ken Slash!!
混沌終焉 必殺のファイナル・ホープ剣・スラッシュ!!

REGULAR.description:
Winning comes with the ultimate price when Yuma realizes victory will cost more than just losing his friendship with Shark, it will mean losing Shark forever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 最後の希望!! 我は「ビヨンド」

REGULAR.description:
Expect the unexpected as the game-changing conclusion of Yuma’s duel against Shark flares to a frenzied finish!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kokou no Duelist "Nash": Shukumei no Last Duel!!
孤高の決闘者[デュエリスト]『ナッシュ』 宿命のラストデュエル!!

REGULAR.description:
Having gathered all one hundred Numbers, Astral is finally prepared to fulfill his mission – to destroy Barian World!  But in order to see his mission through, Astral will have to destroy his friendship with Yuma first!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tatakai no Gi! Yuuma vs. Astral
